sqlMap.select: SELECT e.id , e.label , e.description , e.descriptionkr , sum(p.usdprice) as usdprice , sum(p.krwprice) as krwprice FROM edition_package ep , (SELECT * FROM edition WHERE productid = #product# ) e , (SELECT * FROM productpackage WHERE product = #product# AND licenseusage = #licenseusage# AND licenseterm = #licenseterm# ) p WHERE 1 = 1 AND ep.editionid = e.id AND ep.packageid = p.packageid AND ep.licensesize = p.licensesize GROUP BY ep.editionid ORDER BY ep.editionid
SELECT id , editionid , packageid , licensesize , licenseterm FROM edition_package WHERE 1 = 1 AND editionid = #editionid# ORDER BY packageid ASC
